Event.name: Deception_success
Event.definition: <def-root>A Deceiver successfully causes a Victim to end up with incorrect beliefs about a Topic. The Victim comes to these beliefs from perceiving a Deception.</def-root>

Arg.name: Deceiver
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who acts so as to give the <fen>Victim</fen> an incorrect idea about a <fen>Topic</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Victim
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who receives an incorrect idea because of the <fen>Deceiver</fen>'s actions.</def-root>

Arg.name: Topic
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity to which the misleading idea relates, what it is about.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The action performed by the <fen>Deceiver</fen> to fool the <fen>Victim</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time at which the deception occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location at which the deception occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Phenomenon
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Phenomenon</fen>, as percieved by the <fen>Victim</fen>, causes the <fen>Victim</fen> to have an incorrect understanding about a <fen>Topic</fen>.</def-root>
